title: Sound On: WH Covid Messaging Shifts After Biden Diagnosis
itunes:title: Sound On: WH Covid Messaging Shifts After Biden Diagnosis
description:
Joe was joined by Chris Meekins, Healthcare Policy Analyst and Managing Director at Raymond James on President Biden's Covid diagnosis and the prospects for Congress to pass Covid-19 funding. Former Federal Prosecutor Michael Zeldin on what to expect during tonight's primetime Jan 6. hearing. Plus, Bloomberg Politics Contributor Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Republican strategist Doug Heye discussed President Biden's Covid diagnosis, the Jan 6 hearing, and Nancy Pelosi deflecting questions about a possible trip to Taiwan due to security concerns. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
